text:
LOS ANGELES, CA - JUNE 30: (L-R) Ralph Tresvant, Ricky Bell and Ronnie Devoe perform onstage with New Edition during R. Kelly, New Edition and The Jacksons at the 2013 BET Experience at Staples Center on June 30, 2013 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Earl Gibson III/Getty Images for BET)

The seminal R&B group New Edition dished out nostalgia along with their signature dance moves while receiving the BET Lifetime Achievement Award. In addition to the performance (where they were joined with the cast members of their show), a tribute video, and a speech, the group that dominated the ’80s gave a lengthy performance, including hits “Can You Stand the Rain” and “If This Isn’t Love.”

Watch the performance below.
